body:
So me and avum are making a map, and I won't spoil too much, but in reality, it just doesn't fit super well with DTM..

I dunno.
The purpose of this thread was to ask :
Should they bring in CTF / CTW ?

title: Would Anyone Mind...

replies.body: In my opinion, although they're not unique, we need CTW.
replies.body_tagged: In my opinion, although they're not unique, we need CTW.

replies.body: Going to sound dumb what's CTW?
replies.body_tagged: Going to sound dumb what's CTW?

replies.body: CTW = capture the wool. It is a gamemode that used to be used on MCzone nebula. There are two wool rooms the aim is to get to the enemies wool room take the wool and get it back to your spawn without being killed. There is often buffs in the wool rooms to help you get back! In my opinion it is the best gamemode and I would love to see it added back!
replies.body_tagged: CTW = capture the wool. It is a gamemode that used to be used on MCzone nebula. There are two wool rooms the aim is to get to the enemies wool room take the wool and get it back to your spawn without being killed. There is often buffs in the wool rooms to help you get back! In my opinion it is the best gamemode and I would love to see it added back!

replies.body:
CTW is as unique as DTM imo.



Btw, Rendezvous 2 is originally a CTW, thats why the game play is kinda dodgy
